name: ApplauseMachine
0:
”Alexa open applause machine”
”Alexa ask applause machine to cheer me”
”Alexa ask applause machine to make me happy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: applause machine
des: Did Something Fantastic ? Need a pat on the back? Feeling good About Yourself? How about a round of applause and cheering to celebrate the same. Just Fire up the Applause Machine Skill and have Alexa give you the appreciation you deserve.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
